data.title: ILIO Releases “The Fame Series: Modern Pop 2”, a Patch Library for Omnisphere
data.meta_description: Leading distributor of virtual instruments and audio processing software ILIO and electronic music producer, sound-designer, and musician...
data.text:
Westlake Village, CA – May 30, 2023 – Leading distributor of virtual instruments and audio processing software ILIO and electronic music producer, sound-designer, and musician Reverb Machine announce a new collection of patches for Spectrasonics Omnisphere called “The Fame Series: Modern Pop 2.” The Fame Series are patch libraries for Spectrasonics Omnisphere dedicated to capturing the sounds of famous tracks throughout the ages. Modern Pop 2 (the fourth installment in the Fame Series) is a collection of famous synth sounds used in today’s popular music. With Modern Pop 2, the focus is on songs from current, chart-topping artists. And since these patches are replicated from famous songs, they’ll add that hit-making magic with very little fuss.

This new patch collection is now available from ILIO and its vast dealer network.

Learn more here – https://www.ilio.com/the-fame-series-modern-pop-2

Represented in this collection are sounds that pay homage to Doja Cat, Justin Bieber, Dua Lipa, The Kid Laroi, Lizzo, Miley Cyrus, Lil Nas X, Caroline Polachek, Post Malone, Charlie Puth, Olivia Rodrigo, Rosalia Saoko, Rosalia Versace, Taylor Swift, Charli XCX, Ariana Grande, Beyoncé, Drake, Lady Gaga, Cardi B, Robyn, Sam Smith, Mimi Webb, Harry Styles, Ed Sheeran, Christine and the Queens and more. Modern Pop 2 provides great starting points for new, organic compositions.

While the sounds of Modern Pop 2 may have gold record status and are very recognizable in their original context, they really come to life when called into service in original music. This collection infuses productions with the sheen and polish of top-shelf, contemporary sound design!

Included in Modern Pop 2 are:

– 4 ARP + BPM patches

– 3 Pads + Strings patches

– 21 Synth Bass patches

– 9 Mono Synths patches

– 23 Poly Synths patches

– 7 Short Synths patches

In addition, Modern Pop 2 is now also included in The Fame Series Bundle patch collection for Spectrasonics’ award-winning Omnisphere Power Synth (along with Modern Pop 1, Indie Pop, and Classic Pop)!

About the Sound Designer

Reverb Machine is the work of Dan Carr, a London based electronic music producer, sound-designer and musician. After working predominantly as a live musician, he started exploring the world of synthesizers, sharing presets and sound design tips on reverbmachine.com. Topics include the synth sounds of popular artists, the generative music techniques of Brian Eno, and music theory. He also produces content for Reverb.com and is currently working on a debut album.

Modern Pop 2 requires Omnisphere version 2.8, which is a free update available for all registered Omnisphere 2 users.

About ILIO

Founded in 1994, ILIO is a leading distributor of virtual instruments and audio processing software for the Pro Audio and MI industries. They represent products used by hundreds of top-shelf recording artists, studio musicians, composers and producers. Their product line includes Spectrasonics, Vienna Symphonic Library, Synthogy, Applied Acoustics Systems, Overloud, Audio Modeling, PlugIn Guru, Delta Sound Labs and Hornberg Research.

Learn more about ILIO and all our partners at www.ILIO.com
